A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: No I am not a \"die hard\" fan as others would like people to believe.... This was just a flat out terrible movie... Rian Johnson should be ashamed of himself... This is not about changing the story or going into another direction.. This is just garbage story telling with no regard of characters or lore created either within this trilogy or the first 6 movies... The entire movies plot literally ends up how it starts and its completely pointless... You will leave the movie stunned and confused with more questions that will never be answered
